## AppStylePredicate type

Determine if [AppStyle](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md) should be included during runtime integration.

Provides app, micro frontend, and seed author fine-grained control over what assets they will accept in their target integration points.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AppStylePredicate = (style: AppStyle, context?: AppContext) => boolean;
```
**References:** [AppStyle](./foundation-shell.appstyle.md), [AppContext](./foundation-shell.appcontext.md)
